content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Complex at position(1.0, 1.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Stone furnace at (1.0, 1.0) actively smelting iron ore
- Stone furnace at (3.0, 1.0) waiting for ingredients
- Burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
- Output chests at (1.5, 3.5) containing iron plates and (3.5, 3.5)

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex around position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0) [out of fuel]
- Burner mining drill at (1.0, -60.0) [out of fuel]
- Stone furnace at (-27.0, -59.0) with full copper plate output
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Input chest at (1.5, -58.5) containing iron ore
- Output chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Assembly Line Complex around position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Assembling machine 1 at (14.5, 14.5) set to produce copper cable [no power]
- Assembling machine 1 at (21.5, 15.5) set to produce electronic circuits [no power]
- Multiple burner inserters and chests for input/output:
  - Input chest at (14.5, 11.5)
  - Output chest at (11.5, 14.5) containing copper cable
  - Input/output chests at (17.5, 14.5), (21.5, 11.5)
  - Output chest at (24.5, 15.5) containing electronic circuits

### Power Generation System around position(37.5, 19.0)
Consists of following entities:
- Boiler at (37.5, 19.0)
- Steam engine at (43.5, 19.5)
- Offshore pumps at (-7.5, 25.5), (2.5, 34.5), and (2.5, 36.5)
- Multiple pipe networks connecting these components

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting various parts of the factory, including:
- Belt networks running from mining areas to smelting areas
- Belt networks connecting smelting areas to assembly machines
- Belt networks for moving products between different production areas

ERROR TIPS

### Power System Connection Issues
- Ensure power poles are properly connected to form a complete electrical network
- Connect power generating equipment (steam engines) to machines requiring electricity

### Resource Extraction and Processing Issues
- Keep mining drills fueled to maintain continuous operation
- Monitor furnace output capacity and ensure there is space for processed materials

### Production Flow Issues
- Ensure assembling machines have all required ingredients before setting recipes
- Set up proper input/output connections for assembling machines

### Crafting System Usage
- Items requiring furnaces or assembling machines cannot be manually crafted
- Use appropriate production facilities for items like iron plates and pipes

### Entity Placement
- Check space requirements before placing new entities
- Ensure proper connections between related entities (like power poles, pipes, belts)
